nodes.text: Glen Mullaly is a Canadian book and magazine illustrator who co-illustrated, with Ken Steacy, X-Wing Marks the Spot, Imperial Spy and Podracing Tales as well as numerous Star Wars children's books for Random House and Golden Books, among others.
In May of 2008 he co-created the Growing Up Star Wars: 1977-1985 vintage photo group on the image sharing site flickr.
